verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to the rebellious <WH5637> <WH8802> children <WH1121>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, that take <WH6213> <WH8800> counsel <WH6098>, but not of me; and that cover <WH5258> <WH8800> with a covering <WH4541>, but not of my spirit <WH7307>, that they may add <WH5595> <WH8800> sin <WH2403> to sin <WH2403>:

That walk <WH1980> <WH8802> to go down <WH3381> <WH8800> into Egypt <WH4714>, and have not asked <WH7592> <WH8804> at my mouth <WH6310>; to strengthen <WH5810> <WH8800> themselves in the strength <WH4581> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, and to trust <WH2620> <WH8800> in the shadow <WH6738> of Egypt <WH4714> !
Therefore shall the strength <WH4581> of Pharaoh <WH6547> be your shame <WH1322>, and the trust <WH2622> in the shadow <WH6738> of Egypt <WH4714> your confusion <WH3639>.
For his princes <WH8269> were at Zoan <WH6814>, and his ambassadors <WH4397> came <WH5060> <WH8686> to Hanes <WH2609>.

They were all ashamed <WH3001> <WH8689> of a people <WH5971> that could not profit <WH3276> <WH8686> them, nor be an help <WH5828> nor profit <WH3276> <WH8687>, but a shame <WH1322>, and also a reproach <WH2781>.

The burden <WH4853> of the beasts <WH929> of the south <WH5045>: into the land <WH776> of trouble <WH6869> and anguish <WH6695>, from whence come the young <WH3833> and old lion <WH3918>, the viper <WH660> and fiery <WH8314> flying <WH5774> <WH8789> serpent <WH8314>, they will carry <WH5375> <WH8799> their riches <WH2428> upon the shoulders <WH3802> of young asses <WH5895>, and their treasures <WH214> upon the bunches <WH1707> of camels <WH1581>, to a people <WH5971> that shall not profit <WH3276> <WH8686> them.

For the Egyptians <WH4714> shall help <WH5826> <WH8799> in vain <WH1892>, and to no purpose <WH7385>: therefore have I cried <WH7121> <WH8804> concerning this <WH2063>, Their <WH1992> strength <WH7293> is to sit still <WH7674>.

Now go <WH935> <WH8798>, write <WH3789> <WH8798> it before them in a table <WH3871>, and note <WH2710> <WH8798> it in a book <WH5612>, that it may be for the time <WH3117> to come <WH314> for <WH5704> ever <WH5703> and ever <WH5769>:
That this is a rebellious <WH4805> people <WH5971>, lying <WH3586> children <WH1121>, children <WH1121> that will <WH14> <WH8804> not hear <WH8085> <WH8800> the Torah <WH8451> of the YY <WH3068>:

Which say <WH559> <WH8804> to the seers <WH7200> <WH8802>, See <WH7200> <WH8799> not; and to the prophets <WH2374>, Prophesy <WH2372> <WH8799> not unto us right things <WH5229>, speak <WH1696> <WH8761> unto us smooth things <WH2513>, prophesy <WH2372> <WH8798> deceits <WH4123>:

Get you out <WH5493> <WH8798> of the way <WH1870>, turn aside <WH5186> <WH8685> out of the path <WH734>, cause HaKadosh <WH6918> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> to cease <WH7673> <WH8685> from before <WH6440> us.

Wherefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> HaKadosh <WH6918> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Because ye despise <WH3988> <WH8800> this word <WH1697>, and trust <WH982> <WH8799> in oppression <WH6233> and perverseness <WH3868> <WH8737>, and stay <WH8172> <WH8735> thereon:

Therefore this iniquity <WH5771> shall be to you as a breach <WH6556> ready to fall <WH5307> <WH8802>, swelling out <WH1158> <WH8737> in a high <WH7682> <WH8737> wall <WH2346>, whose breaking <WH7667> cometh <WH935> <WH8799> suddenly <WH6597> at an instant <WH6621>.

And he shall break <WH7665> <WH8804> it as the breaking <WH7667> of the potters <WH3335> <WH8802> ' vessel <WH5035> that is broken in pieces <WH3807> <WH8800>; he shall not spare <WH2550> <WH8799>: so that there shall not be found <WH4672> <WH8735> in the bursting <WH4386> of it a sherd <WH2789> to take <WH2846> <WH8800> fire <WH784> from the hearth <WH3344> <WH8803>, or to take <WH2834> <WH8800> water <WH4325> withal out of the pit <WH1360>.

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, HaKadosh <WH6918> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; In returning <WH7729> and rest <WH5183> shall ye be saved <WH3467> <WH8735>; in quietness <WH8252> <WH8687> and in confidence <WH985> shall be your strength <WH1369>: and ye would <WH14> <WH8804> not.

But ye said <WH559> <WH8799>, No; for we will flee <WH5127> <WH8799> upon horses <WH5483>; therefore shall ye flee <WH5127> <WH8799>: and, We will ride <WH7392> <WH8799> upon the swift <WH7031>; therefore shall they that pursue <WH7291> <WH8802> you be swift <WH7043> <WH8735>.

One <WH259> thousand <WH505> shall flee at <WH6440> the rebuke <WH1606> of one <WH259>; at <WH6440> the rebuke <WH1606> of five <WH2568> shall ye flee <WH5127> <WH8799>: till ye be left <WH3498> <WH8738> as a beacon <WH8650> upon the top <WH7218> of a mountain <WH2022>, and as an ensign <WH5251> on an hill <WH1389>.

And therefore will the YY <WH3068> wait <WH2442> <WH8762>, that he may be gracious <WH2603> <WH8800> unto you, and therefore will he be exalted <WH7311> <WH8799>, that he may have mercy <WH7355> <WH8763> upon you: for the YY <WH3068> is a 'Elohim <WH430> of judgment <WH4941>: blessed <WH835> are all they that wait <WH2442> <WH8802> for him.

For the people <WH5971> shall dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> in TZiyon <WH6726> at Yerushalayim <WH3389>: thou shalt weep <WH1058> <WH8799> no more <WH1058> <WH8800>: he will be very <WH2603> <WH8800> gracious <WH2603> <WH8799> unto thee at the voice <WH6963> of thy cry <WH2199> <WH8800>; when he shall hear <WH8085> <WH8800> it, he will answer <WH6030> <WH8804> thee.

And though the YY <WH136> give <WH5414> <WH8804> you the bread <WH3899> of adversity <WH6862>, and the water <WH4325> of affliction <WH3906>, yet shall not thy teachers <WH3384> <WH8688> be removed into a corner <WH3670> <WH8735> any more, but thine eyes <WH5869> shall see <WH7200> <WH8802> thy teachers <WH3384> <WH8688>:

And thine ears <WH241> shall hear <WH8085> <WH8799> a word <WH1697> behind <WH310> thee, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, This is the way <WH1870>, walk ye in it <WH3212> <WH8798>, when ye turn to the right hand <WH541> <WH8686>, and when ye turn to the left <WH8041> <WH8686>.

Ye shall defile <WH2930> <WH8765> also the covering <WH6826> of thy graven images <WH6456> of silver <WH3701>, and the ornament <WH642> of thy molten images <WH4541> of gold <WH2091>: thou shalt cast them away <WH2219> <WH8799> as a menstruous cloth <WH1739>; thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8799> unto it, Get thee hence <WH3318> <WH8798>.

Then shall he give <WH5414> <WH8804> the rain <WH4306> of thy seed <WH2233>, that thou shalt sow <WH2232> <WH8799> the ground <WH127> withal; and bread <WH3899> of the increase <WH8393> of the earth <WH127>, and it shall be fat <WH1879> and plenteous <WH8082>: in that day <WH3117> shall thy cattle <WH4735> feed <WH7462> <WH8799> in large <WH7337> <WH8737> pastures <WH3733>.

The oxen <WH504> likewise and the young asses <WH5895> that ear <WH5647> <WH8802> the ground <WH127> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> clean <WH2548> provender <WH1098>, which hath been winnowed <WH2219> <WH8802> with the shovel <WH7371> and with the fan <WH4214>.

And there shall be upon every high <WH1364> mountain <WH2022>, and upon every high <WH5375> <WH8737> hill <WH1389>, rivers <WH6388> and streams <WH2988> of waters <WH4325> in the day <WH3117> of the great <WH7227> slaughter <WH2027>, when the towers <WH4026> fall <WH5307> <WH8800>.

Moreover the light <WH216> of the moon <WH3842> shall be as the light <WH216> of the sun <WH2535>, and the light <WH216> of the sun <WH2535> shall be sevenfold <WH7659>, as the light <WH216> of seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, in the day <WH3117> that the YY <WH3068> bindeth up <WH2280> <WH8800> the breach <WH7667> of his people <WH5971>, and healeth <WH7495> <WH8799> the stroke <WH4273> of their wound <WH4347>.

Behold, the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> cometh <WH935> <WH8804> from far <WH4801>, burning <WH1197> <WH8802> with his anger <WH639>, and the burden <WH4858> thereof is heavy <WH3514>: his lips <WH8193> are full <WH4390> <WH8804> of indignation <WH2195>, and his tongue <WH3956> as a devouring <WH398> <WH8802> fire <WH784>:

And his breath <WH7307>, as an overflowing <WH7857> <WH8802> stream <WH5158>, shall reach to the midst <WH2673> <WH8799> of the neck <WH6677>, to sift <WH5130> <WH8687> the nations <WH1471> with the sieve <WH5299> of vanity <WH7723>: and there shall be a bridle <WH7448> in the jaws <WH3895> of the people <WH5971>, causing them to err <WH8582> <WH8688>.

Ye shall have a song <WH7892>, as in the night <WH3915> when a holy <WH6942> solemnity <WH2282> is kept <WH6942> <WH8692>; and gladness <WH8057> of heart <WH3824>, as when one goeth <WH1980> <WH8802> with a pipe <WH2485> to come <WH935> <WH8800> into the mountain <WH2022> of the YY <WH3068>, to the mighty One <WH6697> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And the YY <WH3068> shall cause his glorious <WH1935> voice <WH6963> to be heard <WH8085> <WH8689>, and shall shew <WH7200> <WH8686> the lighting down <WH5183> of his arm <WH2220>, with the indignation <WH2197> of his anger <WH639>, and with the flame <WH3851> of a devouring <WH398> <WH8802> fire <WH784>, with scattering <WH5311>, and tempest <WH2230>, and hailstones <WH68> <WH1259>.
For through the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> shall the Ashurn <WH804> be beaten down <WH2865> <WH8735>, which smote <WH5221> <WH8686> with a rod <WH7626>.

And in every place <WH3605> where the grounded <WH4145> staff <WH4294> shall pass <WH4569>, which the YY <WH3068> shall lay <WH5117> <WH8686> upon him, it shall be with tabrets <WH8596> and harps <WH3658>: and in battles <WH4421> of shaking <WH8573> will he fight <WH3898> <WH8738> with it.

For Tophet <WH8613> is ordained <WH6186> <WH8803> of old <WH865>; yea, for the king <WH4428> it is prepared <WH3559> <WH8717>; he hath made it deep <WH6009> <WH8689> and large <WH7337> <WH8689>: the pile <WH4071> thereof is fire <WH784> and much <WH7235> <WH8687> wood <WH6086>; the breath <WH5397> of the YY <WH3068>, like a stream <WH5158> of brimstone <WH1614>, doth kindle <WH1197> <WH8802> it.
